items.name: Classic Cheeseburger
items.description: A timeless classic! Juicy beef patty, melted cheese, fresh lettuce, tomatoes, pickles, and our signature sauce on a toasted bun.
items.ingredients: Beef patty, Cheese, Lettuce, Tomato, Pickles, Bun, Signature sauce
items.extra: The Classic Cheeseburger is a masterpiece of simplicity. A juicy beef patty, melted cheese, and crisp veggies are hugged by a soft, toasted bun. Our secret sauce adds the perfect tangy kick. It’s not just a burger—it’s a flavor explosion that’ll have you coming back for more. Perfect for lunch, dinner, or anytime you need a tasty pick-me-up.

items.name: BBQ Bacon Burger
items.description: Smoky BBQ sauce, crispy bacon, sharp cheddar, and a perfectly grilled beef patty. Messy but totally worth it!
items.ingredients: Beef patty, BBQ sauce, Bacon, Cheddar cheese, Lettuce, Bun
items.extra: The BBQ Bacon Burger is a flavor-packed adventure. Smoky BBQ sauce, crispy bacon, and sharp cheddar cheese come together on a juicy beef patty. It’s messy, indulgent, and absolutely delicious. Perfect for when you’re craving something bold and satisfying. Warning: napkins are mandatory!

items.name: Mushroom Swiss Burger
items.description: Sautéed mushrooms, melted Swiss cheese, and a juicy beef patty on a toasted bun. Earthy and indulgent!
items.ingredients: Beef patty, Swiss cheese, Mushrooms, Caramelized onions, Bun
items.extra: The Mushroom Swiss Burger is a gourmet delight. Sautéed mushrooms and caramelized onions add a rich, earthy flavor, while melted Swiss cheese brings it all together. Perfect for when you’re craving something hearty and satisfying.

items.name: Spicy Jalapeño Burger
items.description: For heat lovers! A beef patty topped with jalapeños, pepper jack cheese, and spicy mayo. Fire up your taste buds!
items.ingredients: Beef patty, Pepper jack cheese, Jalapeños, Spicy mayo, Lettuce, Bun
items.extra: The Spicy Jalapeño Burger is not for the faint of heart. Fresh jalapeños and pepper jack cheese bring the heat, while spicy mayo adds an extra kick. If you love bold flavors, this one’s for you!

items.name: Veggie Delight Burger
items.description: A plant-based patty with avocado, spinach, and a tangy vegan sauce. Healthy and delicious!
items.ingredients: Veggie patty, Avocado, Spinach, Vegan sauce, Tomato, Bun
items.extra: The Veggie Delight Burger is a guilt-free treat. A flavorful veggie patty is topped with creamy avocado, fresh spinach, and a tangy vegan sauce. Perfect for vegetarians and health-conscious eaters!

items.name: Double Trouble Burger
items.description: Double the beef, double the cheese, double the flavor! A meat lover’s dream.
items.ingredients: 2x Beef patty, 2x Cheddar cheese, Lettuce, Tomato, Pickles, Bun
items.extra: The Double Trouble Burger is a beast of a meal. Two juicy beef patties, double cheddar cheese, and all the classic toppings make this a must-try for anyone who loves a hearty burger. Warning: you might need two hands for this one!

items.name: Hawaiian Teriyaki Burger
items.description: Sweet and savory! A beef patty glazed with teriyaki sauce, topped with grilled pineapple and crispy bacon.
items.ingredients: Beef patty, Teriyaki sauce, Grilled pineapple, Bacon, Lettuce, Bun
items.extra: The Hawaiian Teriyaki Burger is a tropical twist on a classic. Sweet teriyaki glaze, juicy grilled pineapple, and crispy bacon create a flavor explosion that’ll transport you to the islands. Aloha!

items.name: Truffle Butter Burger
items.description: Indulge in luxury! A beef patty topped with truffle butter, arugula, and shaved Parmesan. Sophisticated and delicious.
items.ingredients: Beef patty, Truffle butter, Arugula, Parmesan, Bun
items.extra: The Truffle Butter Burger is a gourmet experience. Rich truffle butter, peppery arugula, and shaved Parmesan elevate this burger to a whole new level. Perfect for a fancy night out—or in!

items.name: Breakfast Burger
items.description: Breakfast meets burger! A beef patty topped with a fried egg, crispy bacon, and melted cheddar. Morning perfection.
items.ingredients: Beef patty, Fried egg, Bacon, Cheddar cheese, Bun
items.extra: The Breakfast Burger is the ultimate morning treat. A juicy beef patty, crispy bacon, a perfectly fried egg, and melted cheddar cheese make this burger a breakfast lover’s dream. Who says you can’t have burgers for breakfast?

items.name: Buffalo Blue Cheese Burger
items.description: Spicy buffalo sauce meets tangy blue cheese. A bold flavor combo you won’t forget!
items.ingredients: Beef patty, Buffalo sauce, Blue cheese, Lettuce, Bun
items.extra: The Buffalo Blue Cheese Burger is a flavor explosion. Spicy buffalo sauce and tangy blue cheese create a perfect balance of heat and creaminess. Perfect for those who love bold, adventurous flavors.

items.name: Guacamole Bacon Burger
items.description: Creamy guacamole, crispy bacon, and a juicy beef patty. A match made in burger heaven!
items.ingredients: Beef patty, Guacamole, Bacon, Cheddar cheese, Lettuce, Bun
items.extra: The Guacamole Bacon Burger is a fresh and indulgent treat. Creamy guacamole and crispy bacon add a perfect contrast of textures and flavors. It’s like a fiesta in every bite!

items.name: Southern Fried Chicken Burger
items.description: Crispy fried chicken, coleslaw, and pickles on a soft bun. A Southern classic!
items.ingredients: Fried chicken, Coleslaw, Pickles, Bun
items.extra: The Southern Fried Chicken Burger is a crispy, crunchy delight. Juicy fried chicken, tangy coleslaw, and pickles come together for a taste of the South. Perfect for when you’re craving something comforting.

items.name: Black Bean Veggie Burger
items.description: A hearty black bean patty with avocado, salsa, and cilantro lime sauce. Vegan and delicious!
items.ingredients: Black bean patty, Avocado, Salsa, Cilantro lime sauce, Lettuce, Bun
items.extra: The Black Bean Veggie Burger is a plant-based powerhouse. A flavorful black bean patty is topped with creamy avocado, zesty salsa, and a refreshing cilantro lime sauce. Perfect for vegans and burger lovers alike!

items.name: Smoky Chipotle Burger
items.description: Smoky chipotle sauce, pepper jack cheese, and caramelized onions. A smoky, spicy delight!
items.ingredients: Beef patty, Chipotle sauce, Pepper jack cheese, Caramelized onions, Bun
items.extra: The Smoky Chipotle Burger is a flavor-packed adventure. Smoky chipotle sauce, spicy pepper jack cheese, and sweet caramelized onions create a perfect balance of flavors. Perfect for spice lovers!

items.name: BBQ Pulled Pork Burger
items.description: Tender pulled pork smothered in BBQ sauce, topped with coleslaw. A Southern favorite!
items.ingredients: Pulled pork, BBQ sauce, Coleslaw, Bun
items.extra: The BBQ Pulled Pork Burger is a Southern classic. Tender pulled pork, smoky BBQ sauce, and tangy coleslaw come together for a mouthwatering experience. Perfect for when you’re craving something hearty and comforting.

items.name: Mediterranean Lamb Burger
items.description: Juicy lamb patty with tzatziki, feta, and fresh veggies. A taste of the Mediterranean!
items.ingredients: Lamb patty, Tzatziki, Feta cheese, Cucumber, Tomato, Red onion, Bun
items.extra: The Mediterranean Lamb Burger is a gourmet delight. A juicy lamb patty is topped with creamy tzatziki, tangy feta, and fresh veggies. It’s like a trip to the Mediterranean in every bite!

items.name: Jalapeño Popper Burger
items.description: Creamy jalapeño popper filling, crispy bacon, and a juicy beef patty. Spicy and cheesy perfection!
items.ingredients: Beef patty, Jalapeño popper filling, Bacon, Cheddar cheese, Bun
items.extra: The Jalapeño Popper Burger is a spicy, cheesy dream. Creamy jalapeño popper filling and crispy bacon take this burger to the next level. Perfect for those who love a little heat with their cheese!

items.name: Truffle Mushroom Swiss Burger
items.description: Sautéed mushrooms, truffle aioli, and melted Swiss cheese. A gourmet burger experience!
items.ingredients: Beef patty, Sautéed mushrooms, Truffle aioli, Swiss cheese, Bun
items.extra: The Truffle Mushroom Swiss Burger is a luxurious treat. Earthy mushrooms, rich truffle aioli, and melted Swiss cheese create a flavor combination that’s simply irresistible. Perfect for a special night out!

items.name: Spicy Sriracha Chicken Burger
items.description: Grilled chicken breast smothered in spicy sriracha mayo, topped with crispy onions. A fiery delight!
items.ingredients: Grilled chicken breast, Sriracha mayo, Crispy onions, Lettuce, Bun
items.extra: The Spicy Sriracha Chicken Burger is a fiery treat. Grilled chicken breast, spicy sriracha mayo, and crispy onions create a perfect balance of heat and crunch. Perfect for spice lovers!

items.name: Blue Cheese Bacon Burger
items.description: Tangy blue cheese, crispy bacon, and a juicy beef patty. A bold and indulgent combo!
items.ingredients: Beef patty, Blue cheese, Bacon, Lettuce, Tomato, Bun
items.extra: The Blue Cheese Bacon Burger is a flavor powerhouse. Tangy blue cheese and crispy bacon add a perfect contrast of flavors and textures. Perfect for those who love bold, indulgent burgers!

items.name: Habanero Heat Burger
items.description: For the brave! A beef patty topped with habanero peppers, pepper jack cheese, and spicy mayo. Extreme heat!
items.ingredients: Beef patty, Habanero peppers, Pepper jack cheese, Spicy mayo, Lettuce, Bun
items.extra: The Habanero Heat Burger is not for the faint of heart. Fresh habanero peppers, spicy pepper jack cheese, and fiery mayo create a burger that’s as hot as it gets. Warning: this one’s for true spice lovers only!

items.name: Mango Smoothie
items.description: Thick, creamy, and packed with real mangoes! Perfect for a refreshing tropical vibe.
items.ingredients: Mango, Yogurt, Honey, Ice
items.extra: Our Mango Smoothie is like a tropical vacation in a cup. Made with real mangoes, it’s thick, creamy, and bursting with natural sweetness. A touch of honey and yogurt adds richness, while the ice keeps it refreshing. Perfect for breakfast or a midday treat. One sip, and you’ll feel like you’re on a beach!

items.name: Chai Latte
items.description: A cozy blend of black tea, warm spices, and frothy milk. Comfort in every sip!
items.ingredients: Black tea, Cinnamon, Cardamom, Cloves, Milk, Sugar
items.extra: Our Chai Latte is the ultimate comfort drink. A blend of black tea, cinnamon, cardamom, and cloves creates a warm, spiced flavor that’s perfectly balanced with frothy milk and a hint of sugar. It’s like a cozy hug in a cup—perfect for chilly mornings or relaxing afternoons.

items.name: Shrimp Alfredo
items.description: Rich, creamy Alfredo sauce with plump, juicy shrimp over fettuccine pasta. Absolutely indulgent!
items.ingredients: Shrimp, Alfredo sauce, Fettuccine pasta, Parmesan cheese, Garlic, Butter
items.extra: Indulge in the creamy goodness of our Shrimp Alfredo. Plump, juicy shrimp are tossed in a rich, buttery Alfredo sauce and served over perfectly cooked fettuccine. Every bite is a luxurious mix of savory, creamy, and slightly nutty flavors. It’s the ultimate comfort food for pasta lovers.

items.name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
items.description: Tangy BBQ sauce, grilled chicken, red onions, and mozzarella cheese. A bold and tasty choice!
items.ingredients: BBQ Sauce, Grilled Chicken, Red Onions, Mozzarella Cheese, Pizza Dough
items.extra: Our BBQ Chicken Pizza is a flavor explosion. Tangy BBQ sauce, grilled chicken, and caramelized red onions come together under a blanket of melted mozzarella. The crust is golden and crispy, making every bite a perfect mix of sweet, smoky, and savory. It’s a pizza lover’s dream come true.

items.name: Chicken Tenders
items.description: Crispy, golden-fried chicken strips served with your choice of dipping sauce. Simple, crunchy, and addictive!
items.ingredients: Chicken breast, Flour, Egg, Bread crumbs, Oil, Spices
items.extra: Our Chicken Tenders are the ultimate comfort snack. Juicy chicken breast is coated in a crispy, golden crust that’s perfectly seasoned. Dip them in BBQ, honey mustard, or ranch for an extra kick. They’re simple, satisfying, and impossible to resist. Perfect for sharing—or not!

items.name: Loaded Fries
items.description: A mountain of crispy fries topped with melted cheese, crispy bacon bits, and drizzled with ranch. Perfect for sharing... or not!
items.ingredients: Potatoes, Cheese, Bacon, Ranch sauce, Spices
items.extra: Our Loaded Fries are the ultimate indulgence. Crispy fries are smothered in melted cheese, topped with crispy bacon bits, and drizzled with creamy ranch. It’s a flavor-packed snack that’s perfect for sharing—or keeping all to yourself. Warning: highly addictive!

items.name: Mozzarella Sticks
items.description: Golden-fried mozzarella sticks with gooey cheese inside, served with marinara sauce. A must-have snack!
items.ingredients: Mozzarella cheese, Bread crumbs, Egg, Flour, Marinara sauce
items.extra: Crispy on the outside, gooey on the inside—our Mozzarella Sticks are a snack lover’s dream. Each stick is golden-fried to perfection, with melty mozzarella cheese inside. Dip them in zesty marinara sauce for the ultimate flavor combo. Perfect for sharing—or keeping all to yourself!
